# List View

```python
from PyQt5.QtCore import QStringListModel

slm=QStringListModel()
self.qList=['Item 1','Item 2','Item 3','Item 4']
slm.setStringList(self.qList)
self.DataLV.setModel(slm)
self.DataLV.doubleClicked.connect(self.__LVclicked)
self.DataLV.setEditTriggers(QtWidgets.QAbstractItemView.NoEditTriggers) #设双击时用户不可编辑

def __LVclicked(self,qModelIndex):
    QtWidgets.QMessageBox.information(self,'ListWidget','选择：'+self.qList[qModelIndex.row()])
```
